BEFORE MODIFICATION:
public final [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] val x: <ERROR TYPE REF: Unresolved name: doSmth>
    public [ResolvedTo(BODY_RESOLVE)] [ContainingClassKey=A] get(): <ERROR TYPE REF: Unresolved name: doSmth> {
        ^ <Unresolved name: doSmth>#(String(str))
    }

public final [ResolvedTo(ANNOTATIONS_ARGUMENTS_MAPPING)] val x: <ERROR TYPE REF: Unresolved name: doSmth>
